articles.title: Gordon Ramsey bike accident: Chef shaken after 'really bad' incident - BBC.com
articles.description: The celebrity chef stresses the importance of wearing a helmet, adding that he's "lucky to be standing".
articles.content:
Warning: This article contains images that some people may find distressing
Chef Gordon Ramsay has described feeling shaken after a "really bad" cycling accident in the US.
